snippet: Rescuers were still searching for survivors from two trains that overturned when monsoon rains undermined rail beds in the central state of Madhya Pradesh.
abstract: Officials in India report derailment of two trains at flooded Madhya Pradesh river crossing, killing at least 29 people and injuring at least 70.

byline.original: By HARI KUMAR and SWATI GUPTA

lead_paragraph: Rescuers were still searching for survivors from two trains that overturned when monsoon rains undermined rail beds in the central state of Madhya Pradesh.

headline.main: Trains Derail in India’s Madhya Pradesh, Killing Dozens
headline.print_headline: Trains Derail in Central India, Killing Dozens
